channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LCC -- McAfee Database Security (DAM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LCC -- McAfee Database Security (DAM)

item.title: CVE-2019-3615|2024-08-04T19:12:09.653Z -- mcafee%2C%20lcc -- mcafee%20database%20security%20%28dam%29
item.description: Data Leakage Attacks vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Database Security prior to the 4.6.6 March 2019 update allows local users to expose passwords via incorrectly auto completing password fields in the admin browser login screen.
